## hpr3291 :: The New Audacity and Batch Processing Macros

 When Audacity upgraded it caused some changes that affected my use of it to prepare podcasts I listen to. I did find the answer, though, and I am sharing it with you.

https://hackerpublicradio.org/
https://forum.audacityteam.org/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_DZeio_ansE
https://www.zwilnik.com/the-new-audacity-and-batch-processing-macros/
